summary: When a rancher's family is massacred by a gang of outlaws, he assembles a mean team of convicts as his posse to pursue the killers.
cast: William Holden|Ernest Borgnine|Woody Strode|Roger Hanin|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Jorge Luke|Jorge Martínez de Hoyos|Arthur Hunnicutt|Warren Vanders|Larry Pennell|John Kelly|Scott Holden|James Daughton|Lorraine Chanel|Raúl Pérez Prieto|Susan Hayward|Sergio Calderón|José Chávez|Roger Cudney|Rosa Furman|Rosario Granados|Enrique Lucero|Eduardo Noriega
title: Los vengadores
